step1.title: Global Hotkey Access
step1.description: Press the global shortcut anytime to analyze your prompts. PromptLint works across all apps - IDEs, browsers, text editors, and more.
tips: Change in Settings if it conflicts with other apps
Works with selected text or clipboard content

step2.title: Real-time Analysis
step2.description: Get instant GOLDEN framework scoring: Goal, Output, Limits, Data, Evaluation, Next steps. See what's missing and how to improve.
tips: Higher scores mean clearer, more effective prompts
Red indicators show critical missing elements
Click issues for specific improvement suggestions

step3.title: Clipboard Integration
step3.description: Enable clipboard watching to automatically analyze copied text. Choose manual or auto-analysis modes based on your workflow.
tips: Auto-hide mode: Analyze and hide window automatically
Manual mode: Analyze only when you trigger it
Ghost Bar: Quick preview of improved prompts

step4.title: AI-Powered Improvements
step4.description: Get 3 rule-based prompt variants instantly. Add your API key for AI-powered rewrites with 83%+ improvement rates.
tips: Rule-based variants work offline (no API needed)
Copy improved prompts with one click
